byline.original: Correspondence of The New-York Daily Times

lead_paragraph: MESSRS EDITORS: It is more than a week since I entered Munich, and I would gladly stay weeks longer among its works of art and its friendly People. You inquire the way of a Munichener, and be goes with you to point it out; you are taken into his acquaintance on the road, and called on next day at your hotel to be served with the offices of friendship.

headline.main: MUNICH.; Characteristics of the City--Theatres--Art-Beer--Manners of the People, &c.
